item.title: The Acceptance of Thesis Proposal
item.description: The thesis proposal on Design Fiction XR is accepted by the thesis committee on February 3, 2022.

item.title: From Science Fiction to Design Fiction
item.description: Our latest research "From Science Fiction to Design Fiction: Speculations on The Adaptation of XR Technologies into The Future Spaces" is published in Contemporary Issues in Architecture and Urban Planning: Architectural and Urban Forms by ...
